Pre-Installation

Download

  1. Download live image1), checksums and checksum signature:

    $ RELEASE='<CCYYMMDD>'
$ URL='https://repo-default.voidlinux.org/live/current'
$ curl -LO "${URL}/void-live-x86_64-${RELEASE}-base.iso"
$ curl -LO "${URL}/sha256sum.txt"
$ curl -LO "${URL}/sha256sum.sig"

  2. Download public signing key2):

    $ URL='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/void-linux/void-packages/master/srcpkgs/void-release-keys/files'
$ curl -LO "${URL}/void-release-${RELEASE}.pub"

  3. Verify checksum authenticity and live image integrity:

    $ signify -V -p "void-release-${RELEASE}.pub" -x sha256sum.sig -m sha256sum.txt
$ sha256sum -c --ignore-missing sha256sum.txt "void-live-x86_64-${RELEASE}-base.iso"

Flash USB

  1. Make sure the USB filesystem is not mounted!
  2. Flash USB with disk image:

    # dd if="void-live-x86_64-${RELEASE}-base.iso" of=</dev/sdX> status=progress ; sync

USB Boot

  1. Reboot the system and during the POST phase press BIOS key3) to boot into UEFI.
  2. Make sure that Secure Boot is disabled and reboot.
  3. On next POST phase, press Boot Menu key4) and select (UEFI) USB entry.
1)
Void mirrors: https://docs.voidlinux.org/xbps/repositories/mirrors.
2)
Void release keys: https://github.com/void-linux/void-packages/tree/master/srcpkgs/void-release-keys/files.
3) , 4)
List of POST keys according to vendor: http://www.disk-image.com/faq-bootmenu.htm.
